ja543:17.1: pabyathitā → pabyadhitā (bj, c1) | sabyādhitā (s2, s3) | pavyadhitā (pts1)

ja543:61.2: bhūridatto padassati → bhūridatto padissati (s2, s3) | bhūridattaṃ padissasi (mr)

ja543:74.1: Kacci nu → kaccinnu (bj, pts1), nābhisasi → te nābhisayi (bj) | te nābhissasi (s2, s3)

ja543:93.3: Kacci nu taṃ ḍaṃsī tāta → kacci taṃ nu ḍasī tāta (bj) | kacci nu ḍaṃsito tāta (s2, s3) | kaccitānuḍasī tāta (pts1)
ja543:113.3: taṃ ḍaṃsatvajamukhī → sā dissatu accimukhī (bj) | sā ḍaṃsatu accimukhī (s2, s3) | sā dissatu accīmukhī (pts1)
